basic_data.name: Healing Spirits Herb Farm & Education Center

reviews.title: Holistic Herb Organic Family Owned Farm
reviews.text: You must see to believe this sacred site! AA Raphael hangs out here. Everything anything organic herbal holistic shop. Birth Matt and  Andrea are gifted Reiki healers!  So many exciting new products have come out. Stop by for a fresh cup of tea. Hang with the puppies. Enjoy!
